sentences.en: I did have rather spindly legs.
I'm so glad I planted that spindly little magnolia tree 20 years ago.
sentences.cn: 我很高兴20年前种植了这棵细长的小玉兰树.

sentences.en: Spindly Austin 7's of the'20 s are venerated like doddering old aunties.
sentences.cn: 修长的奥斯汀7世以及20世都已经是人们喜欢的老爷车.

sentences.en: Their spindly, delicate roots seem just plucked from the earth.
sentences.cn: 它们精致 、 细的根系乍看之下还以为是刚从土壤中摘出来的.

sentences.en: This prevents the plant from getting spindly and makes the plant become bushier.
sentences.cn: 可以避免植物朝细长型发展,从而保证其生长浓密.

sentences.en: With increasing of silica content, fiber diameter became fine and spindly beads increased.
sentences.cn: 随着二氧化硅含量的增加, 纤维直径变细,纺锤形珠节结构增多.

sentences.en: With increasing of silica content, fibers diameter became fine and spindly beads increased.
sentences.cn: 随着二氧化硅含量的增加, 直径变细,纺锤形珠节结构增加.

words.tran_cn: 锭子的，锭子似的；细长的
轴；纺锤，锭子；细长的人或物

trans.tran_en: long and thin in a way that looks weak
